attributes.action: Launch an independant public enquiry into the decision making process which lead to the 2003 invasion of Iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Launch an independant public enquiry into the decision making process which lead to the 2003 invasion of Iraq."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11008.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/WarinIraq/
